title: Super Admin login success with valid credentials
description: Verify that a Super Admin can log in successfully using valid username and password, and receives a JWT token with correct role claims.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter valid Super Admin username and password
Click the login button
Check login succeeds and JWT token is issued with Super Admin role
Verify user is redirected to admin dashboard

title: Plant Admin login success with valid credentials
description: Verify that a Plant Admin can log in successfully using valid credentials and receives a JWT token scoped to their assigned plant access.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter valid Plant Admin username and password
Click login button
Login succeeds and JWT token contains Plant Admin role and plant access claims
Redirected to dashboard limited to assigned plant data

title: Login failure with invalid credentials
description: Verify that login fails with invalid username or password and appropriate error message is shown.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter invalid username or incorrect password
Click login button
Login is rejected with error message
No JWT token is issued

title: Role-based route protection restricts unauthorized access
description: Verify that pages protected by role-based access require valid JWT tokens and correct user roles, denying access otherwise.

steps.description: Attempt to access admin dashboard URL without login
Access is denied and redirected to login page
Log in as Plant Admin
Try to access Super Admin only pages
Access denied with permission error
Log in as Super Admin and access all pages
Access granted

title: Visitor registration success with valid data and live photo capture
description: Verify the visitor registration form accepts mandatory inputs including live webcam photo capture, validates them, and saves visitor data successfully.

steps.description: Navigate to visitor registration page
Enter all required visitor details with valid formats
Capture live photo using webcam
Submit the registration form
Visitor data saved to database with photo
Visitor pass is generated and displayed

title: Visitor registration form validation prevents incomplete submissions
description: Verify that the registration form correctly validates all mandatory fields and does not allow submission when fields are missing or invalid.

steps.description: Navigate to visitor registration page
Leave required fields empty or enter invalid data (e.g., incorrect mobile number format)
Attempt to submit form without photo capture
Form submission is blocked
Appropriate validation error messages are displayed

title: Visitor search autofills details by mobile number
description: Verify that entering an existing visitor’s mobile number in the search field auto-populates the registration form with previous visitor details.

steps.description: Navigate to visitor registration page
Enter valid mobile number of previously registered visitor
Visitor details autofill in the form fields

title: Visitor search autofills details by Aadhar number
description: Verify that entering an existing visitor’s Aadhar number autofills the registration form with visitor’s previously stored data.

steps.description: Navigate to visitor registration page
Enter valid Aadhar number of a registered visitor
Visitor details are preloaded in the registration form fields

title: Dashboard displays visitor logs filtered by plant and date range
description: Verify that the admin dashboard correctly filters and displays visitor logs based on selected plant and date range inputs.

steps.description: Log in as Admin
Navigate to dashboard page
Apply filter by specific plant
Apply date range filter
Only visitor logs matching filters are displayed

title: Visitor status management approves a visitor correctly
description: Verify that changing visitor status to 'approved' updates database records with status and timestamp, and reflects in UI.

steps.description: Log in as Admin
Navigate to dashboard visitor logs
Select a pending visitor and approve status
Visitor status updated to approved with timestamp in database
Dashboard UI shows updated status

title: Visitor status management rejects a visitor correctly
description: Verify that rejecting a visitor updates status and timestamp correctly and reflects on admin dashboard.

steps.description: Log in as Admin
Navigate to visitor logs dashboard
Reject a selected visitor
Database records status as rejected with proper timestamp
UI reflects visitor status as rejected

title: Visitor status management marks visitor exit correctly
description: Verify that marking visitor as exited updates exit time in records and dashboard UI accordingly.

steps.description: Log in as Admin
Navigate to dashboard visitor logs
Select a visitor currently inside and mark exit
Exit timestamp is recorded in database
Dashboard UI shows visitor as exited

title: Visitor detail editing updates records through modal
description: Verify that editing visitor details through the modal updates database correctly and UI shows updated information.

steps.description: Log in as Admin
Open visitor edit modal from dashboard
Modify visitor detail fields
Submit changes
Database reflects updated visitor details
Dashboard UI shows updated visitor information

title: Super Admin blacklists a visitor preventing future registrations
description: Verify that blacklisting a visitor by Super Admin blocks visitor from future registration and is enforced by the system.

steps.description: Log in as Super Admin
Blacklist an existing visitor from dashboard
Visitor record is marked as blacklisted in database
Attempt to register the blacklisted visitor again
System prevents registration with an appropriate error message

title: Unblacklisting visitor restores registration ability
description: Verify that Super Admin can unblacklist a visitor, restoring their ability to register visits again.

steps.description: Log in as Super Admin
Unblacklist a previously blacklisted visitor on dashboard
Visitor blacklisted flag is removed in database
Attempt registration for unblacklisted visitor
Registration succeeds

title: Soft deletion hides visitor records but retains data for audits
description: Verify that soft deleting a visitor record hides it from UI but does not remove it from the database.

steps.description: Log in as Super Admin
Soft delete a visitor record from dashboard
Visitor is no longer shown in UI lists
Visitor record remains in database marked as deleted

title: CSV report generation exports filtered visitor data accurately
description: Confirm that CSV report generation exports the visitor data correctly according to selected date and plant filters without data loss.

steps.description: Log in as Admin
Navigate to report generation section on dashboard
Select plant and date range filters
Generate CSV report
CSV file is downloaded
CSV contains all visitor data matching filters

title: Print slip generation includes photo and visitor EHS details
description: Verify that generating a printable visitor pass includes the visitor’s photo, all required visitor details, and EHS guidelines formatted correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to a visitor record on dashboard
Click on print slip generation
Printable slip displays visitor photo
Slip includes visitor details and EHS guidelines
Layout matches specification

title: Photo upload handled securely and stored correctly
description: Verify that visitor photos captured on registration are uploaded securely using Multer middleware and stored with correct association to visitor records.

steps.description: Fill visitor registration form including photo capture
Submit the form
Photo file is successfully uploaded to server using Multer
Photo stored and linked to visitor record in database
Uploaded photo is retrievable for display in UI or print slips

title: System runs on HTTPS with valid certificate enabling webcam access
description: Verify the system serves all pages over HTTPS with valid certificate allowing webcam access for live photo capturing on supported browsers.

steps.description: Access application URL via HTTPS
Browser shows no security warnings for certificate
Navigate to visitor registration page
Request webcam access for photo capture
Browser grants webcam permission and webcam stream is active
